data.name: Fill in an order
data.description:
You started working for online store as IT developer. One of your new tasks is to automate the process of filling orders for customers.
  
  Complete the function ```fillInOrder``` where data object is a single argument and has 3 properties:

```
{
  name: 'Jon',
  phone: 1234567,
  order: 688
}
```

  Return a string formatted as an information for customer:

```
'Dear Jon, your order is â„–688. Our manager will call you by phone number 1234567 very soon.'
```

  Type of ``` name ``` should be String and not empty in input (otherwise return ``` undefined ```). Value of this property should start with uppercase in output.

  Type of ``` phone ``` should be Number in input and contain 7 digits (otherwise return ``` undefined ```).

  Property ``` order ``` comes frome our server and so is always correct.
